de.rwth.idsg.adapter.json2soap

Class RequestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rwth.idsg.adapter.json2soap.RequestUtils

  • public class RequestUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible of syntactically converting JSON-RPC request messages into SOAP request messages.

    • Method Detail

      • validateRequest

        public byte[] validateRequest(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode inputJson)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the incoming request for syntax errors according to JSON-RPC 2.0 Specification. If an error is found, a JSON-RPC error response is created.
        Parameters:
        inputJson - incoming JSON-RPC request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processHeader

        public java.util.List<org.apache.cxf.binding.soap.SoapHeader> processHeader(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode input)
                                                                     throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                                                                            org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                            java.io.IOException
        Converts each element in "SOAP-HEADER" JsonNode into a SoapHeader, and adds each SoapHeader to a list. !Namespace/prefix for each element must be provided by client!
        Parameters:
        input - the "SOAP-HEADER" member under the params member
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

      • processBody

        public java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> processBody(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode params,
                                              java.lang.String method)
                                                throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
        Creates the SOAP body. Because JSON-RPC can send only one method request at a time, there is no possibility of multiple body elements. Reminder: According to JSON-RPC 2.0 Specification params node MAY be omitted.
        Parameters:
        params - params member of the JSON-RPC request
        method - The method that the JSON-RPC request calls
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

      • setDefaultNamespace

        private void setDefaultNamespace(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
        If client did not provide a namespace for the element, set to default namespace of Web Service.
        Parameters:
        element - An XML element

      • convertToXml

        private org.w3c.dom.Element convertToXml(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node,
                               java.lang.String rootName)
                                  throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Converts a JsonNode into Xml element.
        Parameters:
        node - JsonNode to be converted
        rootName - String to be written as the root for Xml
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
